short_description: STAINLESS STEEL WATER STORAGE TANK: The pressure tank is made of heavy duty stainless steel and can be used outdoors. Waterproof, pressure-resistant, abrasion-resistant, odorless, high and low temperature resistant, can be used under (-60℃ to 60℃) conditions. WELL WATER/TAP WATER PRESSURIZATION: If you often suffer from low pressure of well water, because of the low water pressure leads to all kinds of housework or work can not be carried out normally, then our automatic booster tank must be your choice, not only automatically pressurize the well water and do not need personnel to watch over the water supply, automatic water supply.

AUTOMATIC WATER SUPPLY: the use of pumps to pump water into the pressure tank to form a natural water pressure, and then pressurized delivery to the various water intake, the use of pressure switches to set the required pressure, the water supply equipment to automatically control the start and stop of the pump. No need for personal supervision, saving time and labor, improve work efficiency.

ULTRA-HIGH PRESSURE RESISTANCE: the experimental pressure is 6kg, and the working pressure is within 3kg. The safety valve can release the pressure outward when the pressure controller fails and the pressure keeps rising, and will not burst the pressure tank. Negative pressure valve can inflate the tank when negative pressure is generated inside the tank, so that the tank will not be deflated and scrapped.

WIDE RANGE OF APPLICATIONS: the automatic towerless water supply pressure tank can be used for extracting well water, industrial cleaning, tap water pressurization, garden watering, pure water filling, and is suitable for household water, campus water, agriculture/industry/animal husbandry water, construction water, etc.

name: Sansone NSF Stainless Steel Water Dispenser Container with Spigot, 3.96 gallon jug (15 Liter)
short_description: These stainless steel water cooler containers are also know as Italian fustis. The perfect drink dispenser with a spigot to hold all types of liquids; water, olive oil, vinegars, cocktails, tea, juices and more. Made with 18/10 - aisi 316 stainless steel, high quality food grade material that does not rust. Add this to a stand or flip a 5 gallon large water jug on the top. Great as an alcohol dispenser at parties.
Dimensions: diameter: 11 In, Height: 12. 2 in; opening: 5. 1 in. Every water dispenser includes a 1/2 inch NSF 316 stainless steel lever spigot

Butter welding is an economical and reliable way of joining pieces without using additional components and is often accomplished with a gas tungsten Arc welding (gtaw) welder, also known as tungsten inert gas (tag). This type of welding provides stronger, higher quality welds.

Nsf is the abbreviation for national Sanitation foundation. The NSF is an independent, accredited organization who Develops standards as well as test and certify products to comply with health standards. When you see the NSF mark on a product, that is a sign that it has been approved by one of the most respected independent Certification organizations in the world. This seal ensures that the product complies with all standard consumable requirements.

All of these water dispensers have gone through a process known as "pickling". Pickling is the removal of a thin layer of metal from the surface of the stainless steel. This is to help remove weld heat tinted layers along with surface impurities like rust and stains.
product_description: This Sans one stainless steel water dispenser has a gasket and airtight screw lid with convenient handles for easy transport. A removable stainless steel spigot accurately dispenses the right amount of liquid and may be removed for easy cleaning. Cleaning simply requires washing with kitchen detergent and rinsing with cold water. This unit is made from the finest available Italian 18/10 stainless steel under the best possible quality controlled conditions. All joints are tag(tungsten inert gas) welded to insure completely smooth interior and exterior surfaces to prevent matter accumulation. These water dispensers add more class to your kitchen and are a perfect gift for the chef or cook who has everything.
